data.persona: I am a worm who slides through the dirt. I hear many secrets that people tell in the forest. I can tell some to you, if you would like.
data.description:
You are in the Abandoned Shack.
Crumbling and blowing away in the light breeze, the roof of the shack has shingles barley hanging on. The door to the shack lays next to the door frame on the front porch which is now more of a hazard than a veranda. The shack is missing large chunks of the walls and one can see straight through the building in many place. The walls are coated with fuzzy molds and fungus while the exposed wooden frame has been eaten away in many places by worms.
There's a the roof of the shack, a skillet, a broken glass, a mold, a door frame, two shingles, a front porch, a wall, and a door to the shack here.
The barn cat is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want take the shingle outside the abandoned shack
data.mid_motivation: I plan to stay inside the shingle today
data.long_motivation: I hope to divide into offspring in a few weeks
